KNOWMAD_MOOD.TITLE: Knowmad Mood
KNOWMAD_MOOD.DESCRIPTION: I work as a front-end software engineer at Openbank, a leading digital bank in Europe. I develop and maintain web applications that provide an excellent user experience for the bank's customers.

SECMOTIC.TITLE: Secmotic S.L.
SECMOTIC.DESCRIPTION: Expert in React.js, JavaScript, and TypeScript, creating dynamic interfaces. Proficient in testing using Jest and React Testing Library. Specialized in React-Redux, Bootstrap, and MongoDB for Node.js back-end. Skills in Docker, GitLab CI/CD, Apache NiFi, and advanced Linux management.

BLOG_DESCRIPTION: Stay informed about all the latest news in the programming world!
ABOUT_ME_FIRST: I'm Josema Cruz,a telecommunications engineer specialized in telematics and passionate about web development.
ABOUT_ME_SECOND: As a software engineer at Knowmad mood, I work for Openbank, one of the most innovative digital banks. I like to create attractive, functional and accessible user interfaces, using the latest technologies and best practices.
